name: RIA:RIA_2011_Services_Indicators
title: LGA Infrastructure and Essential Services Indicators 2011

legal.licenceType: Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Australia (CC BY-NC 3.0 AU)

abstract:
This data has been created by the Regional Australia Institute for the [In]Sight competitive index, released in 2012. Modeled on the World Economic Forums Global Competitiveness Report, [In]Sight was developed in collaboration with Deloitte Access Economics and combines data from sources including the Australian Bureau of Statistics and the Social Health Atlas of Australia.

Infrastructure and transport (and, by extension, essential services) are crucial elements in determining the location of, and type of, investment activities and business sectors that can develop in a region.

Well-developed infrastructure, particularly dependable electricity and telecommunications systems are an integral component of business production. Similarly, effective transport systems are vital in allowing regions to move their goods and services in a secure and timely fashion. Both of these measures directly influence a region's competitiveness as they improve the region's ability to host economic activities through adequate infrastructure and also increase the region's ability to interact with other markets.

selectedAttributes.title: LGA Code
selectedAttributes.description: The ABS code of the LGA

selectedAttributes.name: AHS_meas
selectedAttributes.title: Access to allied health services
selectedAttributes.description: Measurement: % of workforce employed in health services (excluding hospitals) (Source: ABS Census 2011 - Table builder, industry of employment by LGA)

selectedAttributes.name: GPsrv_meas
selectedAttributes.title: Access to GP services
selectedAttributes.description: Measurement: Number of GP services per capita (Source: Social Health Atlas of Australia)

selectedAttributes.name: HS_meas
selectedAttributes.title: Access to hospital services
selectedAttributes.description: Measurement: Number of people employed in hospitals in a region per resident population (Source: ABS Census 2011 - Table builder, industry of employment by LGA)

selectedAttributes.name: v_meas
selectedAttributes.title: Access to primary education services
selectedAttributes.description: Measurement: Distance to nearest primary school (km) (Source: MySchools Data)

selectedAttributes.name: DisSS_meas
selectedAttributes.title: Access to secondary education services
selectedAttributes.description: Measurement: Distance to nearest secondary school (km) (Source: MySchools Data)

selectedAttributes.name: tfe_meas
selectedAttributes.title: Access to technical or further education
selectedAttributes.description: Measurement: % of working age population attending technical or further education institutions (Source: Source: ABS Census 2011 - Table builder, Educational attendance by LGA, ABS Census 2011 - Table builder, population by LGA)

selectedAttributes.name: tes__meas
selectedAttributes.title: Access to tertiary education services
selectedAttributes.description: Measurement: % of working age population attending university or another higher education institution (Source: ABS Census 2011 - Table builder, Educational attendance by LGA, ABS Census 2011 - Table builder, population by LGA)

selectedAttributes.name: Avi_meas
selectedAttributes.title: Aviation Infrastructure
selectedAttributes.description: Measurement: Distance to and from region's business centre to nearest airport (km) (Source: GIS Calculations)
